Name: The Serpent's Lure
Description: A fanged mouth rears from the water, big enough to bite a boat in half or swallow a pig! The 'woman' contorts and slides into the water: she's the tip of the monster's tail. This will be untidy.

DefaultEvent.Name: A noisy thrashing
DefaultEvent.Description: Lucky one keeps fish about one's person, eh? One never knows when one will need fish.

ChildBranches.Name: Pacify it
ChildBranches.Description: Fling it bait, and move on.

DefaultEvent.Name: A terrible toll
DefaultEvent.Description: The beast's scales are proof against pistol-shot, and it wreaks terrible havoc before you manage to bring it down. You harvest its bones, and scrape its hatching young from along the rocks by the shore.

ChildBranches.Name: Obliterate it
ChildBranches.Description: It's a formidable beast. But you're formidable too.

DefaultEvent.Name: A terrible toll
DefaultEvent.Description: The beast's neck snakes out and snaps up a single struggling zailor with terrible deliberation. The rest of you scramble inland. It submerges, eyeing you with reptilian malice. A zee-serpent that masquerades as a lady! Well, it's a tale to tell.

ChildBranches.Name: Flee!
ChildBranches.Description: It is always preferable to fight zee-serpents from inside a ship. Not from inside a serpent. Withdraw as best you can.
